name: commentimg
description: Enhance your code with images as comments

commentimg.workspace_path_override.description: Override path to workspace to display images from. Leave Empty to use default one. Useful for devcontainers. this is relative to homedir if commentimg.home_dir_override is set.

commentimg.home_dir_override.description: Override (outer) homedir for using this extension in devcontainer (if path rel. to home dir and usernames in docker and outside not equal).
